product_name: REI InCamp Insulated Air Sleeping Pad
long_description: With its integrated pillow and insulated air baffles, the warm and cushy REI InCamp Insulated Air Sleeping Pad allows you to rest well on your car-camping adventures. Pad baffles are insulated with ultralight and ultrawarm PrimaLoft(R) Infinity fill. Integrated pump lets you inflate the pad by hand rather than by mouth; its 2 high-flow valves lie flat to stay out of the way. Pad can be quickly connected to another REI InCamp Insulated air pad using its 3 side buckles. Brushed polyester surface is soft and slip-resistant; 75-denier polyester bottom resists wear; all seams are welded. R-value equals 3.5; most sleeping pads REI sells range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (highly insulated). The REI InCamp Insulated Air Sleeping Pad comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: With its integrated pillow and insulated air baffles, the warm and cushy REI InCamp Insulated Air Sleeping Pad allows you to rest well on your car-camping adventures.
